verbs.description: [ARG0: Sen. Chuck Schumer] [V: blasted] [ARG1: a Trump administration plan to nix stricter gas mileage standards for cars] - [ARGM-ADV: saying besides hurting the environment , it will hit drivers in the wallet] .
